alert.note: Alert for Clarke (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued August 27 at 9:23AM CDT until August 28 at 7:12PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Mississippi... Chickasawhay River At Enterprise affecting Clarke County. Tallahala Creek At Laurel affecting Jones County. ...The Flood Warning is cancelled for the following rivers in Mississippi... Leaf River At Hattiesburg affecting Forrest County. For the Pascagoula...including Collins, Near Hattiesburg, Hattiesburg, Laurel, Chunky, Arundel, Enterprise, Shubuta, Brooklyn...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW EVENING... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Chickasawhay River At Enterprise. * WHEN...Until tomorrow evening. * IMPACTS...At 32.0 feet, Flood water crosses River Road, County Road 320 near River Walk Gardens. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 AM CDT Saturday the stage was 31.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage just after midnight tonight and continue falling to 12.3 feet Thursday morning. - Flood stage is 25.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 am CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sun Mon Tue Chickasawhay River Enterprise 25.0 31.2 Sat 8 am CDT 22.2 15.7 13.8 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Forecast includes rainfall on the ground and 24 hours of additional rainfall. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued this morning at 1030 AM CDT.
